title: How can I report account which is deputated by another person?
body: Summoner name "thesalzz" is deputated by summoner "LK Garlic". "thesalzz" never played mordekaiser, yasuo, gangplank, ekko and top jax in normal but used in ranked for several times with a high winrate. Please check those accounts.

replies.body: Anytime you need to report someone, the best way to do that is using the report button in the post game lobby. If for some reason you can't, make sure to take screenshots of what happened and shoot those our way in a ticket.
